parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance that is associated with the IPv6 address to which the egress-only rule is applied.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the instance to which you want to apply the egress-only rule. Set the value to

**Ipv6Address**, which specifies that the egress-only rule applies to an IPv6 address.

parameters.name: Ipv6EgressOnlyRuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the egress-only rule that you want to query.

parameters.name: Ipv6GatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPv6 gateway.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the IPv6 gateway is deployed. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
